General.Name: China Minmetals Rare Earth Co Ltd
General.Description: China Rare Earth Resources And Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the production and operation of rare earth oxides and other products in China and internationally. Its rare earth oxide products include samarium, erbium, gadolinium, holmium, neodymium, terbium, lanthanum, yttrium, europium, praseodymium, lutetium, and dysprosium oxides, as well as ceria. The company also offers rare earth metals and other products; and engages in solid ore exploration, as well as provides rare earth technology research and development, and consulting services. The company's products are used in various applications, including magnetic materials, luminescent materials, catalytic materials, crystalline materials, high-end electronic components, and other fields. The company was formerly known as China Minmetals Rare Earth Co., Ltd and changed its name to China Rare Earth Resources And Technology Co., Ltd. in October 2022. China Rare Earth Resources And Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Ganzhou, China.
